attributes.action: give Phil The Power Taylor an MBE for his services to the sport of darts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is basically a petition designed to highlight how much of an influence 14 time world Darts Champion Phil Taylor has had on the development of darts as a sport. He has been the domanant force of darts for the last 20 years and i think its about time he recieved the recognition he deserves.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
